Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute at Fullerton/Mango
ShortDescription: 74 Fullerton  buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Central, Grand and Fullerton due to street blockage near Fullerton/Mango.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fullerton, Central, Grand and Fullerton, due to streeet blockage near Fullerton/Mango.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
